card.name: Sr Spellcyclica, Dragment Symbol
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your graveyard For No Cost ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

card.name: Batocross Battle, Passion Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone during your opponent's turn, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the End Step

card.name: Nicol Bolas
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, your opponent discards 7 cards from their hand. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Kernel, Blue Stagnation Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent’s creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Puchohenza, Mia Moja
card.text: ■ Revolution Change: Light or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more ■ Triple Breaker ■ Your opponent's creatures that cost less than the number of cards in your mana zone are put tapped. ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, put all creatures that have power less than this creature into their owner's mana zones.

card.name: Mixel, Strange Stone/Jamming Chaff
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature that costs more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone, your opponent puts it on the bottom of their deck. ========================= ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Iron Manhattan
card.text: ■ Joe ■ Speed Attacker ■ When you put this creature, choose 2 of your opponent's shields and this creature breaks the rest. Then you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, next turn, your opponent can't put 2 or more creatures into the battle zone.

card.name: Okke Brothers
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and untap it.

card.name: Bishamons Deken/「Come from the Abyss, The Soul」
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. ========================= ■ Put all non-evolution creatures from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Bishamons Deken/「Come from the Abyss, The Soul」
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. ========================= ■ Put all non-evolution creatures from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Rabiripit, Remembrance Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, discard one of your opponent's cards at random. ■ During your turn, whenever you summon a creature that costs 8 or more or cast a spell that costs 8 or more, your opponent discards their hand.

card.name: Crash Head, Victorious Dragon Armored
card.text: ■ Bad Action Dynamite ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature is destroyed, if it's tapped, take an extra turn after this one. ■ While battling, this creature gets +5000 power.

card.name: Crash Head, Victorious Dragon Armored
card.text: ■ Bad Action Dynamite ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature is destroyed, if it's tapped, take an extra turn after this one. ■ While battling, this creature gets +5000 power.

card.name: Zanbari, Darma
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Weissing, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature in your graveyard. If it's a Magic Tool that costs 4 or less, put it into the battle zone, Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Vomirror, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Once during your turn, you may summon a Magic Tool from your graveyard.

card.name: Luginus, Dragon Armored Doctor/God Hand of Hell
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, put a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. ========================= ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Gayoushin
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, if you have 5 or more Jokers in the battle zone or mana zone, draw 2 cards. Then you may discard a Jokers from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Achernar, Star Gate Elemental/Stargaze Gate
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ End Step ========================= ■ Put a non-evolution light creature that has "blocker" from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Ori, Sneak Tank/Togeball Cannonball
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, one of your other creatures gets "speed attacker" until the End Step ========================= ■ Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have "blocker".

card.name: Valchuris, Dragon Armored
card.text: ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if this creature is in your hand, and that attack is the second attack by a creature this turn, after the attack, unless you put a '''Valchuris, Dragon Armored''' this turn, you may put this creature. ■ Speed Attacker

card.name: Chaunics, Blizzard Faerie/Snowbo Patrol
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may return a creature from your mana zone to your hand. ========================= ■ Put 2 cards from your graveyard into your mana zone tapped.

card.name: Borgies, Puppet Warrior/Jennyco's Unknown World

card.name: The Shio Ramen
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger

card.name: Kuromame Danshaku/Hakumai Danshaku
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature with an ability that starts with "When you put this creature into the battle zone" ========================= ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Charmeijin, Hundred Delivery
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may put any number of creatures that have "Men" in their Card Name

card.name: Deal, Mechanic/「Today's Lucky Number!」
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, choose a number. Return all your opponent's creatures that cost the same as that number to their owner's hand. ========================= ■ Choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't summon creatures that have the same cost or cast spells that have the same cost.

card.name: Icarino Sabato
card.text: ■ Whenever a card is put into your shield zone, choose one of your opponent's creature and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's turn.

card.name: Keijimeno Sabato
card.text: ■ Whenever a card is added to your shields, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker" until the End Step

card.name: Brain's Coral Saint Tree
card.text: ■ Draw 3 cards. Then you may choose a water card in your hand that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand. If you do, use that card from your hand For No Cost

card.name: Katsuraderansu/「I'm going to Afro!!」
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, put the card on the bottom of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a Jokers creature that costs 6 or less, put it into the battle zone. ========================= ■ Discard a card from your hand. Then draw 2 cards.

card.name: Minomi, Greedy Young Magician
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a spell from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.text: ■ When you summon this creature, you may return any number of your Jokers in the battle zone to your hand.
